verses.name: Revelation 18:14
verses.text: And the fruits that thy soul lusted after are departed from thee, and all things which were dainty and goodly are departed from thee, and thou shalt find them no more at all.

verses.name: Revelation 18:15
verses.text: The merchants of these things, which were made rich by her, shall stand afar off for the fear of her torment, weeping and wailing,

verses.name: Revelation 18:16
verses.text: And saying, Alas, alas, that great city, that was clothed in fine linen, and purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold, and precious stones, and pearls!
